content: April 11 Network gear maker Juniper Networks Inc  estimated lower-than-expected quarterly profit and revenue  hurt by weak demand from enterprise as well as U.S. and European telecom customers.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: Juniper estimates disappoint as enterprise demand falls

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Jan 28 A U.S. congressional probe into the impact of a hack of Juniper Networks Inc  software will examine the possibility that it was initially altered at the behest of the National Security Agency  a lawmaker said in an interview on Thursday.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: RPT-Congress to probe Juniper 'back door' exposure  possible U.S. involvement

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Jan 28 A U.S. congressional probe into the impact of a hack of Juniper Networks Inc  software will examine the possibility that it was initially altered at the behest of the National Security Agency  a lawmaker said in an interview on Thursday.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: Congress to probe Juniper 'back door' exposure  possible U.S. involvement

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Jan 8 Juniper Networks Inc said late on Friday it would stop using a piece of security code that analysts believe was developed by the National Security Agency in order to eavesdrop through technology products.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: Juniper Networks will drop code tied to National Security Agency

content: BOSTON Networking equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc said on Monday it has launched a product review to look for tampering after rival Juniper Networks Inc's disclosure found code in firewall software that made it vulnerable to cyber attacks.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: Cisco reviews code after Juniper breach; more scrutiny expected

content: WASHINGTON A Juniper Networks Inc software coding vulnerability disclosed last week shows the dangers of any weaknesses built into encryption technology  according to computer security experts.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: Juniper breach reflects risk of 'back doors': researchers

content: BOSTON Networking equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc said on Monday it has launched a product review to look for tampering after rival Juniper Networks Inc's disclosure it found code in firewall software that made in vulnerable to cyber attacks.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: Cisco reviews code after Juniper breach; more scrutiny expected

content: WASHINGTON  Dec 23 A Juniper Networks Inc  software coding vulnerability disclosed last week shows the dangers of any weaknesses built into encryption technology  according to computer security experts.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: Juniper breach reflects risk of 'back doors' - researchers

content: BOSTON  Dec 21 Networking equipment maker Cisco Systems Inc said on Monday it has launched a product review to look for tampering after rival Juniper Networks Inc's  disclosure it found code in firewall software that made in vulnerable to cyber attacks.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Cisco reviews code after Juniper breach; more scrutiny expected

content: BOSTON  Dec 21 Cisco Systems Inc said on Monday that it is reviewing its product code for "malicious modification" in the wake of rival Juniper Networks Inc's  disclosure last week that it had found unauthorized code in its firewall software.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: Cisco reviewing product code after Juniper software was altered

content: The U.S. Federal Bureau of Investigation is probing a breach at network gear maker Juniper Networks Inc on suspicion that a foreign government might be responsible for inserting rogue code that could enable spying  CNN reported on Friday   citing unnamed U.S. officials.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: FBI probes breach at Juniper Networks: CNN

content: The U.S. government is investigating unauthorized code inserted in software from Juniper Networks Inc  which experts warned could be a "back door" used to spy on the networking equipment maker's customers  an official told Reuters on Friday.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: U.S. reviews possible 'back door' in Juniper Networks code

content: Dec 18 The U.S. government is investigating unauthorized code inserted in software from Juniper Networks Inc   which experts warned could be a "back door" used to spy on the networking equipment maker's customers  an official told Reuters on Friday.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: UPDATE 1-U.S. reviews possible 'back door' in Juniper Networks code

content: July 23 Juniper Networks Inc's shares rose nearly 10 percent after the network gear maker said second-quarter adjusted profit was above analysts' expectations because of growth in its services business.
name: Juniper Networks Inc
title: Juniper shares jump after profit estimates beat Wall Street

title: Juniper Networks profit beats as cost cuts bear fruit
